data.text:
Net Worth

Category Details Net Worth $13 million Salary N/A Birthdate June 18, 1956 Birthplace Winchester, Virginia Gender Male Height N/A Profession Actor Nationality American

Highlights

Brian Benben is an American actor with a net worth of $13 million. He is best known for his role as Martin Tupper in the HBO comedy television series “Dream On” in the early to mid-1990s. Benben has appeared in various films and television series throughout his career, including “Private Practice,” “Roadies,” “Imposters,” and “I Come in Peace.” He is married to fellow actress Madeleine Stowe.

Early Life

Brian Edward Benben was born on June 18, 1956, in Winchester, Virginia. Raised in New York, Benben attended high school in Marlboro before pursuing his dream of becoming an actor. He spent two years at Ulster County Community College in Stone Ridge, New York, before moving to New York City.

Career

Benben’s career in acting began in 1981 when he landed a main role in “The Gangster Chronicles.” He later appeared on Broadway in John Byrne’s play “Slab Boys” alongside Kevin Bacon, Sean Penn, Val Kilmer, and Jackie Earle Haley. In 1986, Benben had a main role in the series “Kay O’Brien.” However, it was his role as Martin Tupper in the series “Dream On” that brought him widespread recognition. He received the CableACE Awards for Actor in a Comedy Series in 1993 for his work on the show.

In addition to his television work, Benben has appeared in several films, including “Clean and Sober” and “Mortal Sins.” He also had his own show called “The Brian Benben Show” in 1998, where he starred and co-executive produced.

Personal Life

Brian Benben married actress Madeleine Stowe in 1982. The couple has one daughter named May, born in 1996. They currently reside near Johnson City, Texas, after previously living in Santa Monica, California.

Net Worth Over Time

Brian Benben’s net worth has remained relatively stable over the years at $13 million. While there might have been fluctuations due to investments and earnings from his various acting projects, no significant information is available about specific increases or decreases in his net worth.

Components of Net Worth

Benben’s net worth is primarily derived from his successful acting career. Earnings from his television appearances, films, and endorsements contribute to his overall net worth. Additionally, any investments he may have made and other business ventures could also play a role in his financial standing.

While Brian Benben’s specific salary is not available, being a prominent actor in Hollywood, he likely earns a significant amount per project, further bolstering his net worth.
